{"id":1282355341,"question_id":3443,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 days, 23 hours","timestamp":1717904197,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1282355341/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Total Reward Using Operations II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxTotalReward(int[] rv) {\n        \n        int len = rv.length;\n        \n        Arrays.sort(rv);\n        \n        Set<Integer> set = new HashSet<>();\n        set.add(0);\n        \n        \n        int max= 0 ;\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            int c= rv[i];\n            \n            Set<Integer> set2 = new HashSet<>(set);\n            for(int a: set){\n                if(a<c){\n                    set2.add(a+c);\n                    max = Math.max(max, a+c);\n                }\n            }\n            \n            set = set2;\n        }\n        \n        return max;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-total-reward-using-operations-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
